mapper.select: select A.employee_name, B.manage, A.employee_team, A.employee_no from employee A LEFT JOIN manage B ON A.manage_no = B.manage_no ORDER BY A.manage_no desc

select A.employee_name, B.manage, A.employee_team, A.employee_no from employee as A LEFT JOIN manage as B ON A.manage_no = B.manage_no WHERE A.employee_name like concat('%',#{employeeName},'%') and B.manage like concat('%',#{manage},'%') and A.employee_team like concat('%',#{employeeTeam},'%') ORDER BY A.manage_no desc
